issue.title: [C++][Compute] Add residual predicate support to new (Swiss) hash join
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-17202](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-17202). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
Only HashJoinBasicImpl supports residual predicates (non-equality joins). This functionality needs to be ported to SwissJoin as well.
